Description: Papyrus. Recto: demotic prayer to the ibis by Djehutynakh (16 lines).Verso: blank. The height of 37 cm (reconstructed) and palaeographical aspects suggest a date in the early rather than in late Ptolemaic period.
Curator's comments: Bibliography Martin, C.J. 2016-2017. The Michaelides Demotic Material, Enchoria 35: 1-8.
Bibliographic references: Migahid 1986 / Demotische Briefe an Götter von der Spät- bis zur Römerzeit: Ein Beitrag zur Kenntnis des religiösen Brauchtums im alten Ägypten (no.10)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (48780) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/48780)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary, loss Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: Filmoplast T self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
